casebody.data:
No. 75029 Supreme Court of Nevada. APRIL 13, 2013

TCM Law

Rushforth Lee & Kiefer LLP

In the MATTER OF the COLMAN FAMILY REVOCABLE LIVING TRUST, Dated June 23, 2011.

Paul Valer Colman, Trustee of the Colman Family Living Trust, Dated June 23, 2011; and The Colman Family Revocable Living Trust, Dated June 23, 2011, Appellants,
v.
Tonya Collier, Respondent.

ORDER DISMISSING APPEAL

Pursuant to appellant's notice of withdrawal of appeal filed on February 16, 2018, this appeal is dismissed. NRAP 42(b).

It is so ORDERED.
